intro: Connellia, commonly known as the common connellia, is a genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Euphorbiaceae. It comprises several species, most of which are shrubs or small trees native to tropical and subtropical regions. The plants are characterized by their simple, alternate leaves and showy, often brightly colored flowers. Connellia species typically thrive in well-drained soils and require full sun to partial shade for optimal growth. They are sometimes cultivated for ornamental purposes due to their attractive foliage and floral displays.
